brief.description: This is a predicate for the parameter with the first letter capitalized and without a trailing period.
brief.label: Brief

canBeUndefined.brief: This parameter can be undefined even if not optional
canBeUndefined.description: Indicates that parameter can be undefined (NULL) even if not optional.
canBeUndefined.label: Optional

dataType.brief: Data type id for this parameter's value
dataType.description: This is the data type id for this parameter's value.
dataType.label: Data Type

dataTypeParameter.description: See the data type's dataTypeParameterType property to determine how to interpret this.
dataTypeParameter.label: Data Type Parameter

description.brief: Description of this parameter in more detail
description.description: This is the description of this parameter.
description.label: Description

minArgs.brief: Minimum number of values that can be specified for this parameter
minArgs.description: This is the minimum number of values that can be specified for this parameter. If -1, the parameter can be specified exactly once. This can only have a value other than -1 on last parameter where it can have a value of -1 to 127.
minArgs.label: Min Args

name.description: This is the name of this parameter.
name.label: Name

optional.brief: This parameter is optional and can be undefined
optional.description: This indicates that parameter is optional and can be undefined (NULL).
optional.label: Optional

polymorphicDataType.description: The dataType for this parameter is <Type>.
polymorphicDataType.label: Polymorphic Data Type

polymorphicDataTypeParameter.description: The dataTypeParameter for this parameter is <Type>.
polymorphicDataTypeParameter.label: Polymorphic Data Type Parameter
